snippet: Bolstered by a steady flow of good news on the global economy, the S.&P. 500 and Dow Jones reached record highs on Thursday while Nasdaq hit its highest level since 2000.
abstract: Stocks make broad gains, bolstered by stream of positive reports concerning global economy; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index and Dow Jones industrial average reach new highs.
lead_paragraph: Bolstered by a steady flow of good news on the global economy, the S.&P. 500 and Dow Jones reached record highs on Thursday while Nasdaq hit its highest level since 2000.

headline.main: S.&P. Closes Above 1,700 On Positive Economic Data
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Closes Above 1,700 On Positive Economic Data
